translations.app.texts.generalAccess.restricted: Only people with access can open with the link
translations.app.texts.generalAccess.unlisted: Everyone with the survey QR code or link can collect data for this survey
translations.app.texts.generalAccess.public: Everyone can collect data for this survey
translations.app.dialogs.importSites.title: Import data collection sites (.geojson)

translations.app.cards.freeForm.description: Allow data collectors to add and collect data about new locations as they go.

translations.app.cards.predefinedSampleSites.descript: Import areas or points of interest for which data should be collected.

translations.app.cards.generalAccess.title: General access
translations.app.cards.dataVisibility.title: Data visibility
translations.app.cards.dataVisibility.description: Allow data collectors to see each others' data

translations.app.texts.whenAdding: When adding a new collection site...
translations.app.cards.dataSharingTerms.private.descr: Data collectors must agree to share data with survey organizers
translations.app.cards.dataSharingTerms.public.descri: Data collectors waive all rights to data collected as part of this survey under the CC0 license. Survey organizers may share data freely.
translations.app.cards.dataSharingTerms.custom.descri: Define custom terms that data collectors must agree to
translations.app.texts.about.section1: Ground is an open-source community project built by Google and FAO under the Forest Data Partnership with help from SIG, Ecam, and open-source community contributors.
translations.app.texts.about.section2: It is licensed under the {$START_LINK}Apache License, Version 2.0{$CLOSE_LINK}.
translations.app.createSurvey.surveyDetails.title: Start building your survey
translations.app.createSurvey.surveyDetails.descripti: Provide some basic info about your survey
translations.app.createSurvey.jobDetails.title: Add a job
translations.app.createSurvey.jobDetails.description: In the following steps, you'll define the data that should be collected for certain sites as part of this job
translations.app.createSurvey.defineLois.title: Where should data be collected?
translations.app.createSurvey.defineLois.description: Data collectors will complete specified tasks for these sites
translations.app.createSurvey.defineTasks.title: Which data should be collected?
translations.app.createSurvey.defineTasks.description: Data collectors will be prompted to complete the following tasks for each site
Which terms must data collectors agree to?
Select the terms data collectors need to agree to before they get started
translations.app.createSurvey.shareSurvey.title: Share your survey
translations.app.texts.customAgreement: Create a custom agreement which will be shown to data collectors before they can collect data. Data collectors must agree to the terms of this agreement.
translations.app.forms.placeholders.customAgreement: Enter the terms of your custom agreement...
translations.app.cards.dataSharingTerms.private.title: Private
translations.app.cards.dataSharingTerms.public.title: Public
translations.app.cards.dataSharingTerms.custom.title: Custom

translations.app.cards.dataSharingAgreement.title: Data sharing agreement
translations.app.cards.deleteSurvey.description: Permanently delete survey and associated data
translations.app.editSurvey.surveyDetails.title: Survey details
translations.app.editSurvey.sharing.title: Sharing
translations.app.dialogs.addJob.title: Add new job
translations.app.dialogs.renameJob.title: Rename job
translations.app.dialogs.unpublishedChanges.title: Unpublished changes
translations.app.dialogs.unpublishedChanges.content: If you leave this page, changes you’ve made to this survey won’t be published. Are you sure you want to continue?
translations.app.dialogs.deleteJob.title: Delete job
translations.app.dialogs.deleteJob.content: This job and all of its associated data will be deleted. This operation can’t be undone. Are you sure?
translations.app.dialogs.deleteLois.title: Delete predefined sites
translations.app.dialogs.deleteLois.content: All predefined data collection sites and their associated data will be immediately deleted. This action cannot be undone.
translations.app.dialogs.deleteOption.title: Delete option
translations.app.dialogs.deleteOption.content: Are you sure you wish to delete this option? All associated data will be lost. This cannot be undone.
translations.app.dialogs.deleteSurvey.title: Delete survey
translations.app.dialogs.deleteSurvey.content: Are you sure you wish to delete this survey? All associated data will be lost. This cannot be undone.
translations.app.dialogs.disableFreeForm.title: Disable free-form data collection?
translations.app.dialogs.disableFreeForm.content: Data collector will no longer be able to add new sites for this job. Data will only be collected for existing sites.
translations.app.dialogs.invalidSurvey.title: Fix issues with survey
translations.app.dialogs.invalidSurvey.content: To publish changes, fix any outstanding issues with your survey.
translations.app.labels.agreeWithTermsOfService: I have read and agree with terms of service.
